Knee-to-chest

Preparation

Lie on your back on a comfortable surface with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor.

Execution

Gently bring one knee up toward your chest, using both hands to pull it in closer. Keep the other foot flat on the floor. Hold the position for 15-30 seconds, feeling the stretch in your lower back and glutes. Slowly release the first leg and repeat with the other leg.

Muscle groups targeted

  • hip flexors
  • glutes
  • lower back
  • hamstrings
